testcase.classname: As a registered user (student/parent), I want to have access to the login page from the homepage
testcase.name: On the "ufpassword" (forgot password) page,
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "url" address....................................passed When The user clicks on the Login button....................................passed And The user clicks on forgot password link.................................passed And The user enters their emailadress in to the mailtextbox.................passed And The user selects the appropriate panel..................................passed And clicks on submit button.................................................passed Then the user verifies that they receive 'password reset email..............passed
